attributes.action: Ensure that "Flying Spaghetti Monster" beliefs are taught alongside other theories of creationism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many existing petitions regarding the controversial teaching of creationism and in particular so-called "Intelligent Design" in our schools. This petition calls on the Prime Minister to ensure that "Flying Spaghetti Monster" based theories are taught alongside other religious based creationist theories in British schools. The FSM movement has millions of believers who communicate via the Internet.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
